title: I Have Hidden £10,000 For You To Find
summary: Max Fosh hides £10,000 in cash somewhere in the UK and provides a clue for viewers to find it, sponsored by Surfshark VPN.
style: Treasure hunt prank with a comedic twist and sponsorship integration.
payoff: The twist is that the £10,000 in cash is hidden as part of a treasure hunt sponsored by Surfshark VPN, with viewers needing to solve clues to find it.
description: In this video, Max Fosh hides £10,000 in cash somewhere in the mainland of the UK and provides a clue for viewers to find it. The video is sponsored by Surfshark VPN, with Max promoting the VPN service and incorporating it into the treasure hunt theme. He sets rules for the hunt, gives a clue, and encourages viewers to subscribe and turn on notifications to not miss out on finding the cash. The comedic element comes from the absurdity of hiding £10,000 for viewers to find, the playful banter with the sponsor, and the entertaining twist of combining a treasure hunt with a sponsorship deal.
